price: Akasema: Bali amefanya hayo huyu mkubwa wao. Basi waulizeni ikiwa wanaweza kutamka.
arabic: قَالَ بَلۡ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمۡ هَٰذَا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُمۡ إِن كَانُواْ يَنطِقُونَ
footnotes: Kuwanabihisha upotovu wao, alisema kwa kuwakejeli: Hili kubwa lao ndilo lililo tenda hayo! Iulizeni hiyo miungu aliyo yatenda huyu, kama kweli inaweza kujibu suala yenu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla bal faʿalahu kabīruhum hādhā fasalūhum in kānū yanṭiqūna
